name: Classy Games Game Jam - Team Oz
name_original: Classy Games Game Jam - Team Oz
description:
A simple stealth game where you try and escape the bank with your stolen loot, dodging guards, cameras, sunrise and the hole in the loot bag.

This game was made as part of a 7 day game jam for Classy Games Dev Team.

Team members were

Artwork - Henderikus P

Audio - Harrison Guest

Programming - Nefylem and yohaan
